briefTitle: Modulated Accelerated RAdiotherapy in Early Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Postoperative Modulated Accelerated RAdiotherapy (MARA-1) for Early Stage Breast Cancer: a Retrospective Analysis
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Incidence of treatment-related late adverse events
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* confirmed histologic evidence of pTis-pT3 breast cancer
* breast conservative surgery
* post menopausal status
* clear surgical margin

Exclusion Criteria:

* pT4
* positive or close resection margins
* 3 or more metastatic axillary nodes
* nodal irradiation
* M1
